entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Southend Reindeer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Southend 5:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 61 %

Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
